name: John Renegade [DEMO]
description:
• YOU ARE JOHN RENEGADE!
  • YOU HAVE CRASHED YOUR CAR!
  • YOU NEED REVENGE!

WARNING: THE GAME TAKES A MINUTE TO LOAD DONT REFRESH IF IT LOOKS STUCK

Play as John Renegade in this doom inspired First Person Shooter.

Battle against giant spiders and weird aliens in the underground temple.

Solve puzzles to unlock the path forward.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left mouse - Fire shotgun
  • Space - Melee
